Description: Postcard; printed paper; black and white real photograph showing the Cheops Pyramid seen from a balcony of Mena House Hotel in Cairo.
Curator's comments: Real photo card; postally unused but message on the back which reads: "This is where we spent the night Nov 30th Dec 1st '62 after breakfast we went on camels to see the Sphinx & Pyramids at 7 am."
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khufu
